name: Rugby Sevens 23
description:
Get ready to experience the intensity and excitement of rugby 7s like never before with our new game! In this retro-inspired 2D action game, you'll take on the role of a rugby player and lead your team to victory in a full career mode, complete with team building, trading of players, and more.

With real physics and a range of challenging gameplay features, including stamina, CPU AI off the ball running, cross kick, chip kick, skip pass, and auto cut back runs from your team mates, you'll need to use all your skills and tactical nous to outmaneuver the competition and come out on top.

But it's not just about your own performance - you'll also need to master the art of team management and make strategic decisions both on and off the field. Choose the right players for each match, develop your squad's strengths and weaknesses, and trade for the best players in the league to ensure you have the edge when it comes to match day.

With 22 CPU teams to compete against, including some of the best rugby teams in the world, you'll need to be at your best to win. Use your side step move to evade the opposition's defense, or perform a perfectly timed cross kick to set up your team for a try.

And if you just want to jump straight into the action, our exhibition mode lets you pick your favorite team and get straight into the game. So what are you waiting for? Get ready to experience the ultimate rugby 7s game and take your team to the top of the league!
